text: George James Keiser (February 22, 1946 - December 22, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the North Dakota House of Representatives. He represented the 47th district. He was a Republican. Keiser was first elected in 1992. From 1988 to 1992 he was Commissioner of Bismarck. In August 2019, Keiser was diagnosed with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. He died from the disease on December 22, 2021 in Bismarck at the age of 75.Longtime Bismarck lawmaker dies after battle with ALS ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from North Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Bismarck, North Dakota Category:Disease-related deaths in North Dakota Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease
title: George Keiser
